ComicInfo.Title: Cheesy Angles; The Lighter Side of...; Other Fashion Brand Names That Are Actually Acronyms; Home Despot Sales Circular; Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; 10 Sure Signs You’re Suffering From March Madness; Unbearable; A Bloody Mess; Monroe and… the Special Delivery; A Kid’s Guide to Writing Letters; A Mad Look at the Library; Malcontent in the Muddle
ComicInfo.Summary:
A cynical look at justice, elections, lunch, off campus living, interviews, reading, relativity, therapy, teachers, the office, prayers, and doctors.
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.
